recipesJson.name: Layerz DreamCream
recipesJson.author: Deetzz
recipesJson.description:
This Weeks FLV layer on Cream
We spoke about it in this video: https://youtu.be/jF_6rVlT9wo

I was going for A Nice and thick Sweert dessert style Cream that can be used with most flavors for a Dense sweet flavored Cream!

This is basically a Pudding cream that can work well with most flavors Like:
- Strawberry
- Chocolate
- Banana
- Lime

To give you a Pudding styled Cream with any flavor that you think needs a sweet and Dense Cream!

Enjoy
